history.proof: intros a b c H0 H1 H2. unfold eqTerm in H0, H1, H2. unfold plusTerm. sauto lq: on rew: off depth: 3.

ctx: intros a b c H0 H1 H2.
unfold eqTerm in H0, H1, H2.
exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "T2M a" in the current goal.

original: intros a b c H0 H1 H2. unfold eqTerm in H0, H1, H2. unfold plusTerm. rewrite H0, H1, H2. reflexivity.
